thread.title: Tame Impala’s Cameron Avery Announces Tour
thread.title_full: Tame Impala’s Cameron Avery Announces Tour

author: Noah Yoo
title: Tame Impala’s Cameron Avery Announces Tour
text:
Tame Impala’s Cameron Avery Announces Tour Including stops at SXSW Cameron Avery Photo by Zach Michael 
Multi-instrumentalist and Tame Impala bassist Cameron Avery has announced new North American tour dates. Avery’s playing dates supporting his forthcoming debut solo record Ripe Dreams, Pipe Dreams , which arrives March 10 via Anti- . The tour includes stops in Austin, TX for South by Southwest; check out the full itinerary below, which also includes a European leg that kicks off in April. 
Cameron Avery: 
03-09 Brooklyn, NY - Baby's All Right 03-11 Philadelphia, PA - Ortlieb's Lounge 03-12 Washington, DC - DC9 03-14 Nashville, TN - The Basement 03-16 Austin, TX - SXSW 03-21 Los Angeles, CA - Teragram Ballroom 03-22 San Francisco, CA - Rickshaw Stop 03-24 Portland, OR - Holocene 03-28 Minneapolis, MN - 7th Street Entry 03-29 Chicago, IL - Schubas Tavern 03-31 Toronto, Ontario - The Rivoli 04-01 Montréal, Québec - Le Divan Orange 04-03 Allston, MA - Great Scott 04-11 Glasgow, Scotland - King Tut’s Wah Wah Hut 04-12 Manchester, England - Deaf Institute 04-13 London, England - Dingwalls 04-14 Leeds, England - Brudenell Social Club 04-15 Brighton, England - The Haunt 04-17 Koln, Germany - Blue Shell 04-18 Amsterdam, the Netherlands - Paradiso Noord @ Tolhuistuin 04-19 Brussels, Belgium - Orangerie @ Botanique 04-21 Paris, France - La Maroquinerie 04-23 Dudingen, Switzerland - Bad Bonn 04-24 Bologna, Italy - Covo Club 04-25 München, Germany - Feierwerk/Orangehouse 04-28 Berlin, Germany - Berghain Kantine 04-29 Hamburg, Germany - Nochtspeicher 05-01 Stockholm, Sweden - Debraser Strand 05-02 Oslo, Norway - John Dee 05-03 Copenhagen, Denmark - Vega
